title: Vintage Toll House chocolate Chip Pie
directions: Beat the eggs in a large mixing bowl then mix in the flour and sugars until well combined.
Mix in the butter and vanilla then stir in the chocolate chips and walnuts.
Spread the cookie dough into the pie pan and cover the edges of the pie crust with aluminum foil.
In a preheated oven to 325° bake for 60 to 65 minutes.
ingredients: ¾ cup of salted softened butter.
